Reviews.Author: Cesci
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for my mom since I couldn't afford the full size one. She LOVES IT!!! She loves the size and she is always using it. This was the best gift I have ever given her.
Reviews.Title: Present for my Mom

Reviews.Author: Tom Glenn
Reviews.Content: The iPad was received in it's original package. The iPad itself was not damage and worked perfectly out of the box. Other reviews had me worried about whether it would be used or not.
Reviews.Title: Good what I was promised.

Reviews.Author: greenglass
Reviews.Content: I do love my mini. I thought I'd never stop using the Kindle, but now I actually like this better. I can do email on it, but like the computer better for that. Handy to have some games with me at times.
Reviews.Title: Nice for reading books, can do email.

Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: The seller describe the ipad mini well there's nothing wrong with it however the power cords seems like it's not oringinal including the cord. It is repackage which there was no ipad box for it. Everything works fine so I'm happy.
Reviews.Title: Good product acceptable.

Reviews.Author: Rad tech
Reviews.Content: Bought this used and it said it was in excellent condition and it was, looked brand new, no scratches flaws and show of wear! Came quickly and got it for a great price!
Reviews.Title: Never disappointed with amazon!

Reviews.Author: cju747
Reviews.Content: Its an Ipad you cant go wrong! The view screen is just right! My 16 year old is going to love it on Christmas!
Reviews.Title: excellent buy and great price. Shipping was FAST!

Reviews.Author: Marion D. Hill
Reviews.Content: The iPad mini arrived in good condition (albeit late, more on that in a minute). It was sealed in plastic showed no signs if tampering. It came with IOS 6, but within hours updated to IOS 7. It was easy to set up and my mom loves her Christmas present. The iPad  itself I would give 5 stars.The shipping via FedEx Smartpost I would give less than a 1 if possible. I have Amazon Prime  and it (plus 2 other items in the shipment) arrived 2 days late. I completely thought it was lost. The tracking data had it in Dallas for 4 days and the post office never saying whether they received it or not.  Amazon had returned my money. Only after Amazon processed my  refund did new tracking data appear, post dated days before. The iPad and other items were presents and I wanted them so I told them to charge me for them again.It was all a big mess due to FedEx Smartpost u was very disappointed with the delivery that did not arrive on time and poor tracking data that made it seem lost.I am  pleased with the iPad, but very disappointed with this shipping method. Amazon needs to stop using it. I have found endless complaints about it.
Reviews.Title: Good product!

Reviews.Author: D. R. Meredith
Reviews.Content: Apple's iPad Mini is convenient, reliable, and the perfect size for traveling. Recommended for the techies out there who want Ipad capabilities in a smaller size. .
Reviews.Title: Apple iPad Mini Is A Pocket-Sized Convenience

Reviews.Author: Julian M.
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase! I am a student and having a tablet that I can carry to class in my bookbag vs carrying a laptop around with me is so much more convenient when I already have so many other books and binders with me.  I bought the mini vs the regal sized ipad because of the thinness and the lightweight.  I usually have pretty bad buyers remorse, but not with this item.  Its so easy to hold in one hand and operate.  Would highly recommend for any student or teacher, or anyone on the go.
Reviews.Title: Exceptional Device

Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: We travel a lot.  Bought the iPad Mini for ease of carry.  It is lightweight, small and a fully functioning "computer".
Reviews.Title: iPad Mini

Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: I new what I needed and was getting and it is just a mini Ipad. If you are looking for something that is not quite as big as a regular ipad but with the same functionality, then this is the way to go.
Reviews.Title: Great!

Reviews.Author: Derrick Watson
Reviews.Content: Would by again and great Christmas present!  Excellent value for the money and would rec to others.  The is working as promised after 6 weeks of using.
Reviews.Title: Good buy!

Reviews.Author: Denise Eugene
Reviews.Content: Very convenient cause I'm at university right now and I don'ti need to carry tHe laptop all the time cause it's a bit heavy
Reviews.Title: Makes life easier for me

Reviews.Author: jorge negron
Reviews.Content: This is a great mini iPad. Works like every other iPad. Very fast for it size. Love the games you can download to it. Very light and the battery life is about 8 to 10 hours depending on how you use it but really a great apple product.  Love it.
Reviews.Title: I pad mini

Reviews.Author: Ryley Inman
Reviews.Content: We ordered this I-Pad mini to use for road trips because my husband is in the military and we travel often. It's been awesome so far keeping my daughter entertained!
Reviews.Title: We love it!

Reviews.Author: Miriam Santana
Reviews.Content: The Apple iPad Mini MD528LL/A (16GB, Wi-Fi, Black & Slate) is a great purchase along with the Sharkk keyboard (Black) Loving it!!!
Reviews.Title: Apple iPad Mini

Reviews.Author: Marianne Haberstroh
Reviews.Content: Need I say more?Gave as  a gift and it is used extensively everyday since CHristmas!You can't go wrong with this product.Nice size to carry in a purse.
Reviews.Title: Apple

Reviews.Author: Mattie Goben
Reviews.Content: This is my first expierence with the ipad. I love the apps and the ease at which it gets me where I want to go.
Reviews.Title: Ipad mini

Reviews.Author: CDREADER
Reviews.Content: I pad was in better than expected condition. I am very pleased with it. No complaints thank you very much
Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: Just the right size. Fits into my purse very easily and apps are easy to use/access. A birthday gift from my husband...he did well :-)
Reviews.Title: Love it.

Reviews.Author: Nikki dawn Rochester
Reviews.Content: love love love it. I don't think words could describe how much I love this item. use it all the time.
Reviews.Title: ipad mini

Reviews.Author: Mike B.
Reviews.Content: Why haven't I bought one of these earlier??  This is so much better than I had expected.  I use it all the time, and the screen quality, sound and usability is fantastic.  It does use the new Apple charger though...but whatever.  That's Apple's fault, not yours.
Reviews.Title: I love the iPad Mini

Reviews.Author: Charles Brown
Reviews.Content: The Apple Ipadmini is a great product, but the refurbished one we bought was defective.  Places on the screen would not work with touch.  The return process was great and friendly.  Apple products ARE better then the rest of pad wantabees out there.
Reviews.Title: Love IPad mini just bought a refurb lemon

Reviews.Author: J. P. Creamer "JPC"
Reviews.Content: Fully functional iPad and a convenient size for travelling.  Apple products are still overpriced in general, but for the most part good tools.
Reviews.Title: Great size for travelling!

Reviews.Author: Cheryl C. Malandrinos "johnnycat15"
Reviews.Content: We purchased two iPad Minis last year. This unit provides hours of fun for kids and a larger viewing screen than the iPod. You can sync both devices, too. I feared this unit would make the kids abandon their iPods, but they didn't. They use both, because the iPad Mini is more fun to play games on, while the iPod is easier to transport.This unit came well-packaged, which was great to see when it arrived here.
Reviews.Title: Affordable and Fun

Reviews.Author: Dennis Hunt
Reviews.Content: . . . plus it syncs with my Macbook Pro, produces no heat and is easier to use with Chromecast for Netflix than my Pro.
Reviews.Title: Love the size, weight and sharp images . . .

Reviews.Author: Cinnamon M Vosburg
Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome!! I have no complaints with this product. Battery life is excellent. Size is perfect for my mid sized purse.  I have not had any problem with using it either, I have an iPhone so I was somewhat familiar with the IOS but whatever I hadn't seen before was easy to figure out.
Reviews.Title: Didn't know I needed it but now can't live without it

Reviews.Author: Reece Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son, he loves it and no longer "steals" his Mom's. Best Christmas gift this year.
Reviews.Title: Christmas gift

Reviews.Author: Pati Grove
Reviews.Content: They loved it and I got it for a great price on Amazon! It seems to really to be the perfect Christmas present! Works great and they love it! Thanks Amazon and IPad!!!
Reviews.Title: This was a present for my daughter and son-in-law

Reviews.Author: Annamarie
Reviews.Content: i got this 32 gig iPad for only 310 it came in a box with a smart cover. its so light in the hand and has a beautiful display i love it.
Reviews.Title: great iPad

Reviews.Author: Marshall Grooms
Reviews.Content: Great!  Better to take the iPad on the plane than my laptop.  More useful than I ever expected.  Marshall Grooms
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: Omo West
Reviews.Content: I use the iPad mini everyday. I jailbroke it and have app store apps and other useful utilities installed. 64GB is also great for storing lots of movies.
Reviews.Title: Love the iPad Mini

Reviews.Author: sandra
Reviews.Content: Purchased for granddaughter.  She can't put it down.She is taking advantage of learning apps as well as popular games.
Reviews.Title: Review of Apple iPad mini MD531LL/A

Reviews.Author: Leslie J Rice
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Only had it a couple days so getting used to and learning the iPad. So far I'm loving it.
Reviews.Title: Ok

Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I got regular iPAD. But got this anyway, thinking it is more convenient to carry ti around. not disappointed. thanks Apple.
Reviews.Title: Good for travel

Reviews.Author: tina brown
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this mini ipad to everyone! I gave it as a graduation present to my son and he absolutely loved it !
Reviews.Title: absolutley love it!

Reviews.Author: Michael Buchko Jr.
Reviews.Content: I want to start off by saying I usually despise Apple products, mostly because Android offers more for me (like the Amazon AppStore with its Free Paid App of the Day) and is less plain and boring. But I opted to buy an iPad Mini because it was on sale at Walmart for $299. I was going to get the Nexus 7 for $249 but thought for my money the iPad Mini was faster, had a better display and can do virtually everything I'd want or need it to (sans the Amazon AppStore). And I believe I was right.The iPad Mini is the perfect size, being not long and skinny and not perfectly square. It's not too tiny and not overly large. It looks like a giant Galaxy Note II running iOS 6.  It is stick and snappy, loads and plays videos spectacularly, takes great pictures and has a lot of good free and paid for apps that will suit anyone who wants a tablet to play with or do business with.Coming from a Nook Tablet (non-HD) I can say I'm very impressed with this one; how it looks, how it feels and how it performs.  It can do all my Nook Tablet does, and more,  I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase.
Reviews.Title: Perfect 8" tablet

Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: Great apple product, amazing clarity and easy to use. Fully meets my expectations in every way.I would recommend this product to anyone interested in getting one.
Reviews.Title: iPad mini 16 gig

Reviews.Author: carol irvin "carol irvin"
Reviews.Content: I do not think the mini replaces the ipad or the macbook but it does have an important place.First and foremost, it is the crowning glory of all apple products as far as an ebook reader. It reads like a trade paperback in its vertical position. I have read plenty of ebooks on my ipad using ibooks but this puts the ipad inthe shade ebook wise.Second, I have always carried my ipad with me in my purse no matter where I am going. I have now changed this to my ipad mini going along in my purse instead. This gives me access to everything at a perfect, portable size.  I do not need to wear reading glasses to use it.  I find the iphone too small to solely carry that around. Although I prefer going online with my ipad, the mini is perfect for this in carrying around mode.Likewise, I play scrabble, gin rummy and do crosswords on he mini now.  I used to solely use the ipad for this. The reduction in size causes no problems and I can again skip glasses. I am almost 65 so this is a factor for anyone in my age group.I also use the mini now for all of my podcasts.  I love NPR, the New Yorker, the NYTimes, etc., podcasts and mini is perfect for all of those.  It is ideal for both audio and visual podcasts. While I still prefer watching films on my ipad due to the larger screen size, the ipad mini is fine for videos where detail is not as important.I am also now loading different apps onto my mini from what I load onto my ipad. Musical audio visual apps such as Jack White's and Brian Eno's just went onto it as well as several art based apps. Increasingly I am devoting my ipads to films and tv.  I no longer own tv sets, finding the apple products all I need for full audio visual.I use keynote and pages of all of these systems.  Probably the ipad is still my favorite size with those programs but the mini performs very well with them.On a daily basis I am still discovering more and more with the mini.  I am sure I have many discoveries yet to make. But even with only this much discovered, I already love it and highly recommend it.I bought mine online at the apple store.  I got it cheaper than this so you may want to check it out there as well as here. I also got two lines of free engraving etched onto the mini's back, my name and email address,  although you can put whatever you want on yours,
Reviews.Title: another great apple mobile computer device

Reviews.Author: J. Walton
Reviews.Content: I like this better than my fullsize IPAD.  It is one light, thin, sharp looking device.  The design allows you for a much smaller footprint with just a little bit of a smaller screen size.In my house, we have an IPAD 2, IPAD 3, and IPHONE 5's.  So, I am quite familiar with their products.  The mini is for my daughter for X-MAS and I have downloaded the apps for her setting it up.In a nutsheel, the mini is a must buy at a very fair price of $330 considering what you are getting which is the best tablet made in this size range (simply put).For the Apple haters who love to comment on Apple products although choosing not to own them, you cannot run stat for stat because of the IOS is not made for multiple vendors thus it is way more efficient.  And, the image on the IPAD supercedes anything out there just because of color saturation.  Look at users comparisons on You Tube. I have a close friend with a Nexus 7.  The two beside each other and in operation are no comparison, period.  Trust me.Good Luck and understand that the IPAD mini is one slick device and hear to stay for A LONG time.
Reviews.Title: One Slick Device

Reviews.Author: Naughty Marietta
Reviews.Content: Ok, to be clear, I like my iPad. It has served me well thus far. I would like a camera with a better zoom but other than that it hasn't disappointed thus far. What I was very put out with, was the charger that I received. I got one charge out of it before the thing fell apart. The wires tore and it was useless. Unfortunately I was out of the country and left in a lurch. I had to go spend a hefty penny to buy a new charger (working much better than the last one), which pretty much voided anything i saved buy buying a used iPad from a private seller. Live and learn I guess.
Reviews.Title: Mixed feelings.

Reviews.Author: ladyjanegray
Reviews.Content: As an iPad alone, this is nice enough, and I have no complaints. But we bought it to use 4G with S*****,  in order to use Square in our business. That aspect has been an unqualified disaster. It has never worked properly, and S*****-Apple kept telling us that the problem is with the other, and oh by the way we don't have your account, they have it.We have now lost well over a thousand dollars of billable hours, shuttling between Apple and S*****. So, while this is cute as a button, we can't recommend it for any kind of serious work.Update: We cancelled the S***** service, which was fine until we got our monthly bill.Us: "We cancelled this service"S***** "We have no record of that."Us "But we have the cancellation number".S***** "We have no record of that."
Reviews.Title: A Mess

Reviews.Author: dlb "blue"
Reviews.Content: I honestly started out looking at other small tablets. I already have an iPad retina. I wanted something small and light and performed exceptionally well with great features. This was the last one that I looked at and I was amazed at the features and how well it worked. Plus it's SO light and easy to use while having features of the iPad 4 in the mini version. The display is BETTER than the iPad 2, don't let that fool you, and with Siri the newest cameras that come with the iPad 4, video stabilization etc, stereo speakers, 2 not one as some have said. I can't find a thing to complain about and on LTE it rocks!!! I'm finding myself taking this where ever I go. I just love this and the 7.9 inch screen is a HUGE improvement over 7 inch screens. Everything about it filled all of the needs that I had in the small, high powered tablet. It's very attractive too. I find the specs on it make the price very acceptable. I recommend this product highly. Now I need 2 for 2 more of the 5 kids. LOL They use them in school.Thanks.
Reviews.Title: I looked at the others before I chose the IPad Mini, it rocks!

Up to 10 Hours of Battery Life; 0.69 lbs
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPad mini ME217LL/A (64GB, Wi-Fi + Sprint 4G, Black)
